cause.description:
Anyone who is a juvenile diabetic or knows one!! I have been a diabetic for almost 7 years ( I got when i was 7) I had know idea what it was, luckily and non-luckily I had relatives who had it. I have 3 diabetes doctors and have learned many things about it! I have been in the hospitol 3 times and i hope to never have to go again because i really hope they will find a cure soon!
1. IDK what to put here!!
cause.name: **Juvenile Diabetes**
